cyclone.name: ISAIAS
cyclone.current_location: about 100 mi ESE of Jacksonville, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: Accelerating north-northeast toward the northeastern South Carolina / southern North Carolina coast then up the Mid-Atlantic seaboard
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the Cape Fear–Surf City stretch of southeastern North Carolina (just south of Wilmington)

weather_observation.under_warning: Hurricane Warning (also Storm Surge Warning and nested Tropical Storm Warning for broader area)
weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch from Cape Fear, NC to Duck, NC including Pamlico and Albemarle Sounds
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning South Santee River, SC to Surf City, NC; Storm Surge Warning Edisto Beach, SC to Cape Fear, NC; Tropical Storm Warning north of Surf City, NC to Watch Hill, RI
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeastern North Carolina coast, especially Cape Fear to Surf City, with effects spreading up the Mid-Atlantic
weather_observation.wind: Potential for sustained tropical-storm to minimal-hurricane winds (50–70 mph) with higher gusts Monday night
weather_observation.storm_surge: Inundation of 3–5 ft above ground level possible around Cape Fear and the lower Cape Fear River including Wilmington waterfront
weather_observation.rainfall: 3–6 inches with local amounts to 8 inches, producing flash/urban flooding and river rises
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated tornadoes Monday night into early Tuesday; dangerous surf and rip currents
